page.title: 03Maplehurst Farm
page.content: Mr Walker owns 131 acres. At least 3 acres of that is rough untreated area which includes{woodland.}Most of his land is weald clay.There are tractors, fertilizer spreaders,mowers and toppers,sprayer,hay turner,rower,discs and rollers,shearing machine,trailer, elevator,welding equipment,{deer}crate and handling equipment, at the farm.Grass grows best which is treated for hay and silage for winter feeding.He also grows turnips,kale and barley. He uses chemical fertilizer. A livestock farmer is busy all year round.They own a flock of sheep and 103 deer (100 hinds and 3 stags). At present they have 16{llamas}in {quarentine.}A llama is sheared every 5 years.A full llama coat is worth Â£1000 and 45g of wool is worth Â£30.They can not alter the structure of the house because it is 500 years old.
